title: PM congratulates Haider Ali on securing gold in Para-Asian Games
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 26 (APP):Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Thursday felicitated Haider Ali, a Pakistani paraolympian who secured the gold medal in Discus throw at the 4th Para-Asian Games in Hangzhou, China.
“A moment of immense pride for the whole nation, as Haider Ali, a Pakistani paraolympian, secures the Gold in Discus throw at the 4th Para-Asian Games in Hangzhou, China! Your dedication, resilience, and this remarkable achievement inspires us all. Congratulations, Haider Ali!”, he said in a social media post on X.
A moment of immense pride for the whole nation, as Haider Ali, a Pakistani paraolympian, secures the Gold in Discus throw at the 4th Para-Asian Games in Hangzhou, China! Your dedication, resilience, and this remarkable achievement inspires us all. Congratulations, Haider Ali! pic.twitter.com/CMTTUwEzCB
— Anwaar ul Haq Kakar (@anwaar_kakar) October 26, 2023
